TopicTitle: ship flips over when rotating to fast

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.0.0 Windows On a 64-bit system

What Happens: ship flips over when rotating to fast

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

1.) Fly up out of the atmosphere

2.) decouple ship

3.) rotate

Result: steering is very sensitive, when rotating faster and faster you get to a point where the ship start flipping directions. when rotating even faster you get slower.

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

- youtube video

- when going on EVA the Kerbal is shot away with enormous speed

imagelink: http://i.imgur.com/kqMR9zt.png

The ship flipping part looks like the wagon wheel effect, and rapid spinning might also explain why the Kerbal is flung away so violently. There used to be a hard limit on rotation speed, but I'll have to see if that was changed in 1.0.
